options.name: label
options.description: The label for the job you wish to create

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you wish the message to be sent in

options.name: message
options.description: The message you wish to send

options.name: month
options.description: The month you wish the message to occur. Compatible with cron formatting.

options.description: The month you wish the message to occur. Compatible with cron formatting.

options.name: dayofmonth
options.description: The month you wish the message to occur. Compatible with cron formatting.

options.name: hour
options.description: The month you wish the message to occur. Compatible with cron formatting.

options.name: minute
options.description: The month you wish the message to occur. Compatible with cron formatting.
